required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Latest Imaging SPECT System Evaluation Phase 1
clinical_study.official_title: Latest Imaging SPECT System Evaluation Phase 1

brief_summary.textblock: Monocentric study for the evaluation of a whole body CZT scintigraphy system.

detailed_description.textblock: Monocentric evaluation of performances and clinical interest of a whole body scintigraphic acquisition system with CZT digital detectors. Comparison of image quality and resolution of the new system compared to a reference one, on phantoms and during the acquisition of a wide variety of examinations.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: All patients will undergo scintigraphy on 2 distinct devices and the images obtained will be compared.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of images with a score greater than or equal to 4
primary_outcome.description: Rate of images obtaining a score greater than or equal to 4 in visual image quality analysis on a 5-point LIKERT scale.

secondary_outcome.description: Physical measurements of collimator performance on test object.

arm_group.description: All patients will undergo scintigraphy on 2 distinct devices and the images obtained will be compared.

intervention.description: The scintigraphy of the patients will be carried out on 2 distinct devices and the images obtained will be compared.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients referred to our Nuclear Medicine department for bone, cardiac, pulmonary, thyroid, parathyroid, renal or cerebral perfusion scintigraphy or to DaTSCAN.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Under 18 years old patients.
- Pregnant women or at risk of pregnancy.
- Patients under guardianship
- Painful patient (EVA>4)
- Patients in whom a standard examination is not feasible (agitation).
